action_set.description: Estas capacidades incluyen poderes para añadir o quitar miembros del grupo, y para pemitir que se sumen nuevos miembros sin necesidad de invitación.
action_set.name: Membership

action.longdescription: Invitar personas al grupo usando el botón 'Invitar a un nuevo miembro' en Miembros y Roles > subpestaña Miembros.
action.name: member invite

action.description: Expulsar a miembros del grupo usando el botón 'Expulsar del grupo' en Miembros y Roles > subpestaña Miembros. Un propietario puede expulsar a cualquiera, excepto a otro propietario. Si no eres un propietario, un miembro del grupo puede expulsarte sólo si tiene concedida esta capacidad específica. Para quitar capacidades a los miembros, debes tener la de 'Quitar capacidades a miembros'.
action.name: member eject

action.description: Activar/desactivar 'Inscripción libre' y cambiar 'Cuota de inscripción'
action.longdescription: Activar/desactivar 'Inscripción libre' para permitir o no que se unan sin invitación nuevos miembros, y cambiar la 'Cuota de inscripción' en la sección Preferencias del grupo de la pestaña General.
action.name: member options

action_set.description: Estas habilidades incluyen el poder añadir, quitar y cambiar roles, asignarlos a miembros, y darles capacidades
action_set.name: Roles

action.longdescription: Crear nuevos roles en Miembros y Roles > pestaña Roles > botón Crear un rol nuevo.
action.name: role create

action.longdescription: Borrar roles en Miembros y Roles > pestaña Roles > botón Eliminar el rol.
action.name: role delete

action.description: Cambiar nombres de roles, títulos, descripciones y si los integrantes de lo roles son visibles.
action.longdescription: Cambiar nombres de roles, títulos, descripciones y si los integrantes de lo roles son visibles. Esto se hace al pié de la pestaña Miembros y Roles > subpestaña Roles luego de seleccionar un rol.
action.name: role properties

action.description: Designar miembros para el rol de Asignador
action.longdescription: Designar miembros para un rol en la sección Roles asignados de la pestaña Miembros y Roles > subpestaña Miembros. Un miembro con este poder sólo puede asignar a otros el rol que él posee.
action.name: role assign member limited

action.longdescription: Designar miembros para cualquier rol en la sección Roles asignados de la pestaña Miembros y Roles > subpestaña Miembros. *AVISO* Todos los miembros con esta capacidad podrán asignarse a sí mismos (y a otros miembros) roles con mayores poderes de los que actualmente tienen. Potencialmente, podrían elevarse hasta poderes cercanos a los del propietario. Asegúrate de lo que estás haciendo antes de otorgar esta capacidad.
action.name: role assign member

action.longdescription: Quitar miembros de roles en la sección Capacidades asignadas de Miembros y Roles > subpestaña Roles. No se pueden quitar a los Propietarios.
action.name: role remove member

action.description: Assign and Remove Abilities in Roles
action.longdescription: Assign and Remove Abilities in Roles in the Allowed Abilities section of the Members & Roles tab > Roles sub-tab. *WARNING* Any Member in a Role with this Ability can assign themselves--and any other non-Owner Member--all Abilities, potentially elevating themselves to near-Owner power. Be sure you know what you're doing before assigning this Ability.
action.name: role change actions

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to modify this group's identity, such as changing public visibility, charter, and insignia.
action_set.name: Group Identity

action.description: Change Charter, Insignia, and 'Show in search'
action.longdescription: Change Charter, Insignia, and 'Show in search'. This is done in the General tab.
action.name: group change identity

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to deed, modify, and sell land in this group's land holdings. To get to the About Land window, right-click the ground and select 'About Land...', or click the parcel info in the menu bar.
action_set.name: Parcel Management

action.description: Deed land and buy land for group
action.longdescription: Deed land and buy land for group. This is done in About Land > General tab.
action.name: land deed

action.longdescription: Abandon land to Governor Linden. *WARNING* Any Member in a Role with this Ability can abandon group-owned land in About Land > General tab, reverting it to Linden ownership without a sale! Be sure you know what you're doing before assigning this Ability.
action.name: land release

action.longdescription: Set land for sale info. *WARNING* Any Member in a Role with this Ability can sell group-owned land in About Land > General tab as they wish! Be sure you know what you're doing before assigning this Ability.
action.name: land set sale info

action.longdescription: Subdivide and join parcels. This is done by right-clicking the ground, 'Edit Terrain', and dragging your mouse on the land to make a selection. To subdivide, select what you want to split and click 'Subdivide...'. To join, select two or more contiguous parcels and click 'Join...'.
action.name: land divide join

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to change the parcel name and publish settings, Find directory visibility, and landing point & TP routing options.
action_set.name: Parcel Identity

action.description: Toggle 'Show in Find Places' and set category
action.longdescription: Toggle 'Show in Find Places' and setting a parcel's category in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land find places

action.description: Change parcel name, description, and 'Show in search' settings
action.longdescription: Change parcel name, description, and 'Show in search' settings. This is done in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land change identity

action.description: Set landing point and set teleport routing
action.longdescription: On a group-owned parcel, Members in a Role with this Ability can set a landing point to specify where incoming teleports arrive, and also set teleport routing for further control. This is done in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land set landing point

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers which affect parcel options, such as 'Create Objects', 'Edit Terrain', and music & media settings.
action_set.name: Parcel Settings

action.longdescription: Change streaming music and movie settings in About Land > Media tab.
action.name: land change media

action.longdescription: Toggle 'Edit Terrain'. *WARNING* About Land > Options tab > Edit Terrain allows anyone to terraform your land's shape, and place and move Linden plants. Be sure you know what you're doing before assigning this Ability. Editing terrain is toggled in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land edit

action.description: Toggle various About Land > Options settings
action.longdescription: Toggle 'Safe (no damage)', 'Fly', and allow other Residents to: 'Create Objects', 'Edit Terrain', 'Create Landmarks', and 'Run Scripts' on group-owned land in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land options

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers which allow Members to bypass restrictions on group-owned parcels.
action_set.name: Parcel Powers

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can edit terrain on a group-owned parcel, even if it's turned off in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land allow edit land

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can fly on a group-owned parcel, even if it's turned off in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land allow fly

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can create objects on a group-owned parcel, even if it's turned off in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land allow create

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can landmark a group-owned parcel, even if it's turned off in About Land > Options tab.
action.name: land allow landmark

action.description: Allow 'Set Home to Here' on group land
action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can use World menu > Set Home to Here on a parcel deeded to this group.
action.name: land allow set home

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can select group owned parcels as venus when hosting an event.
action.name: land allow host event

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to allow or restrict access to group-owned parcels, including freezing and ejecting Residents.
action_set.name: Parcel Access

action.longdescription: Manage parcel Access lists in About Land > Access tab.
action.name: land manage allowed

action.longdescription: Manage parcel Ban lists in About Land > Ban tab.
action.name: land manage banned

action.longdescription: Change parcel 'Sell passes...' settings in About Land > Access tab.
action.name: land manage passes

action.description: Eject and freeze Residents on parcels
action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can handle an unwelcome Resident on a group-owned parcel by right-clicking them, More >, and selecting 'Eject...' or 'Freeze...'.
action.name: land admin

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to allow members to return objects and place and move Linden plants. This is useful for Members to clean up litter and do landscaping, but it should also be used with care, because there's no undo for returning objects.
action_set.name: Parcel Content

action.longdescription: Return objects on group-owned parcels that are owned by the group in About Land > Objects tab.
action.name: land return group owned

action.longdescription: Return objects on group-owned parcels that are set to the group in About Land > Objects tab.
action.name: land return group set

action.longdescription: Return objects on group-owned parcels that are non-group in About Land > Objects tab.
action.name: land return non group

action.longdescription: Landscaping ability to place and move Linden trees, plants, and grasses. These items can be found in your inventory's Library > Objects folder or they can be created via the Build button.
action.name: land gardening

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to deed, modify, and sell group-owned objects. These changes are done in the Edit Tools > General Tab. Right-click an object and Edit to see its settings.
action_set.name: Object Management

action.longdescription: Deed objects to group in the Edit Tools > General Tab.
action.name: object deed

action.longdescription: Manipulate (move, copy, modify) group-owned objects in the Edit Tools > General Tab.
action.name: object manipulate

action.longdescription: Set group-owned objects for sale in the Edit Tools > General tab.
action.name: object set sale

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers which require Members to pay group liabilities and receive group dividends, and restrict access to group account history.
action_set.name: Accounting

action.description: Pay group liabilities and receive group dividends
action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability will automatically pay group liabilities and receive group dividends. This means they will receive a portion of group-owned land sales which are distributed daily, as well as contribute towards things like parcel listing fees.
action.name: accounting accountable

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to allow Members to send, receive, and view group Notices.
action_set.name: Notices

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can send Notices in Group Information > Notices tab.
action.name: notices send

action.description: Receive Notices and view past Notices
action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can receive Notices and view past Notices in Group Information > Notices tab.
action.name: notices receive

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to allow Members to set up Proposals, vote on Proposals, and view voting history.
action_set.name: Proposals

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can create proposals to be voted on in Group Information > Proposals tab.
action.name: proposal start

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can vote on proposals in Group Information > Proposals tab.
action.name: proposal vote

action_set.description: These Abilities include powers to allow or restrict access to group chat sessions and group voice chat.
action_set.name: Chat

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can join group chat sessions, for text and voice.
action.name: join group chat

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can join group voice chat sessions. NOTE: The Join Group Chat ability is required to access the voice chat session.
action.name: join voice chat

action.longdescription: Members in a Role with this Ability can control access and participation in group voice and text chat sessions.
action.name: moderate group chat
